verses.verse: Now it came to pass after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of Jehovah <WH3068>, that Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, Moses <WH4872>' minister <WH8334>, saying <WH559>,

Moses <WH4872> my servant <WH5650> is dead <WH4191>; now therefore arise <WH6965>, go over <WH5674> this Jordan <WH3383>, thou <WH5971>, and all this people, unto the land <WH776> which I do give <WH5414> to them <WH1121>, even to the children of Israel <WH3478>.
Every place <WH4725> that the sole <WH3709> of your foot <WH7272> shall tread upon <WH1869>, to you have I given <WH5414> it <WH1696>, as I spake unto Moses <WH4872>.

From the wilderness <WH4057>, and this Lebanon <WH3844>, even unto the great <WH1419> river <WH5104>, the river <WH5104> Euphrates <WH6578>, all the land <WH776> of the Hittites <WH2850>, and unto the great <WH1419> sea <WH3220> toward the going down <WH3996> of the sun <WH8121>, shall be your border <WH1366>.

There shall not any man <WH376> be able to stand <WH3320> before <WH6440> thee all the days <WH3117> of thy life <WH2416>: as I was with Moses <WH4872>, so I will be with thee <WH7503>; I will not fail thee <WH5800>, nor forsake thee.
Be strong <WH2388> and of good courage <WH553>; for thou shalt cause this people <WH5971> to inherit <WH5157> the land <WH776> which I sware <WH7650> unto their fathers <WH1> to give them <WH5414>.

Only be strong <WH2388> and very <WH3966> courageous <WH553>, to observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> according to all the law <WH8451>, which Moses <WH4872> my servant <WH5650> commanded <WH6680> thee <WH5493>: turn not from it to the right hand <WH3225> or to the left <WH8040>, that thou mayest have good success <WH7919> whithersoever thou goest <WH3212>.

This book <WH5612> of the law <WH8451> shall not depart <WH4185> out of thy mouth <WH6310>, but thou shalt meditate <WH1897> thereon day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>, that thou mayest observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> according to all that is written <WH3789> therein <WH6743>: for then thou shalt make thy way <WH1870> prosperous <WH6743>, and then thou shalt have good success <WH7919>.

Have not I commanded <WH6680> thee <WH2388>? Be strong and of good courage <WH553>; be not affrighted <WH6206>, neither be thou dismayed <WH2865>: for Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> is with thee whithersoever thou goest <WH3212>.
Then Joshua <WH3091> commanded <WH6680> the officers <WH7860> of the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559>,

Pass <WH5674> through <WH7130> the midst of the camp <WH4264>, and command <WH6680> the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559>, Prepare <WH3559> you victuals <WH6720>; for within three <WH7969> days <WH3117> ye are to pass over <WH5674> this Jordan <WH3383>, to go in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> the land <WH776>, which Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> you to possess it <WH3423>.
And to the Reubenites <WH7206>, and to the Gadites <WH1425>, and to the half <WH2677> - tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519>, spake <WH559> Joshua <WH3091>, saying <WH559>,

Remember <WH2142> the word <WH1697> which Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> you <WH559>, saying, Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430> giveth you rest <WH5117>, and will give <WH5414> you this land <WH776>.

Your wives <WH802>, your little ones <WH2945>, and your cattle <WH4735>, shall abide <WH3427> in the land <WH776> which Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> you beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383>; but ye shall pass <WH5674> over before <WH6440> your brethren <WH251> armed <WH2571>, all the mighty <WH1368> men of valor <WH2428>, and shall help them <WH5826>;

until Jehovah <WH3068> have given <WH5117> your brethren <WH251> rest <WH5117>, as he hath given <WH5117> you <WH3423>, and they also have possessed the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> them <WH7725>: then ye shall return unto the land <WH776> of your possession <WH3425>, and possess it <WH4872>, which Moses the servant <WH5650> of Jehovah <WH3068> gave <WH5414> you beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> toward the sunrising <WH4217>.
And they answered <WH6030> Joshua <WH3091>, saying <WH559>, All that thou hast commanded <WH6680> us we will do <WH6213>, and whithersoever <WH834> thou sendest <WH7971> us we will go <WH3212>.
According as we hearkened <WH8085> unto Moses <WH4872> in all things <WH8085>, so will we hearken unto thee <WH3068>: only Jehovah thy God <WH430> be with thee <WH4872>, as he was with Moses.

Whosoever <WH376> he be that shall rebel <WH4784> against thy commandment <WH6310>, and shall not hearken <WH8085> unto thy words <WH1697> in all that thou commandest <WH6680> him <WH4191>, he shall be put to death: only be strong <WH2388> and of good courage <WH553>.
